meta.title: Beach Bar Joni - Golem, Albania
meta.description: Beach Bar Joni in Golem. Enjoy cocktails, beers, and beautiful beach views. Visit us for an unforgettable bar experience by the sea.

beachRules.title: Beach Umbrellas & Rules
beachRules.subtitle: Enjoy our beach with comfort and respect our guidelines

pricing.title: Umbrella Rental
pricing.note: Umbrella costs 1000 leke for the entire allowed schedule. Beach use is permitted only during 07:00 - 21:00 hours.

section1.title: 1. Beach Spot Reservation Criteria
section1.rule1: Reservations for beach chairs and umbrellas can be made through Beach Bar staff.
section1.rule2: Reserved spots are held until 10:00 AM. After this time, if you don't show up, the spot may be given to others.
section1.rule3: Blocking spots with towels or personal items without a valid reservation is not allowed.
section1.rule4: Use by third parties is not permitted.
section1.rule5: Payment is made in advance for the chosen day or package (daily/weekly/monthly).
section1.rule6: No reservations are accepted without payment.

section2.title: 2. Behavior Towards Staff and Other Beachgoers
section2.rule1: All beachgoers must show respect and proper behavior towards staff and other visitors.
section2.rule2: Loud music is allowed only with personal devices and headphones.
section2.rule3: Use of offensive language, insults, or inappropriate behavior towards anyone is not allowed.
section2.rule4: Parents are responsible for their children's behavior and safety.
section2.rule5: Blocking the visual view for other beachgoers with towels, covers, toys, or other items is prohibited.
section2.rule6: Using toys or playing with them in ways that disturb the comfort and safety of other beachgoers is prohibited.

section3.title: 3. General Rules for Cleanliness, Maintenance and Infrastructure Protection
section3.rule1: Throwing garbage in the sand or sea is strictly prohibited.
section3.rule2: Ask for bags or ashtrays for cigarettes.
section3.rule3: Garbage bins must be used for waste disposal (located near the showers).

subsection1.title: 1. Careful Use
subsection1.rule1: Umbrellas must be opened and closed ONLY by staff carefully to avoid mechanical damage.
subsection1.rule2: In case of strong winds or bad weather conditions, umbrellas must be closed immediately.
subsection1.rule3: Do not hang heavy objects on the umbrella (bags, wet clothes, beach equipment) as they may cause wear or damage.
subsection1.rule4: If you notice any damage or irregularity in the equipment, notify staff immediately for repair or replacement.
subsection1.rule5: Do not jump, apply pressure, hit, sit forcefully on or abuse beach chairs.
subsection1.rule6: Beach chairs cannot be used without being equipped with towels or protective covers from oils, creams, salt water, sweat, or other substances.
subsection1.rule7: Umbrella use by more than three adults is not permitted.

section4.title: 4. Safety and Emergency Rules
section4.rule1: Swimming in prohibited or signaled dangerous areas is forbidden.
section4.rule2: Respect the instructions of the beach guard and informational signs.
section4.rule3: In case of emergency, contact staff, beach guard immediately, or call emergency services.
section4.rule4: For more information, also see the orientation board for sea safety signage.

section5.title: 5. Disciplinary Measures
section5.rule1: Any violation of the regulations may result in a warning or immediate removal from the beach.
section5.rule2: Damage to beach equipment will be penalized with financial compensation according to the value of the damage caused.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.text: Contact our staff for umbrella rentals and any questions about beach rules.
